WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There's a lid on your mouth and mustache, covering up all your talking holes. This is because you kept saying how tall and expensive you are.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine yourself saying how tall and expensive you are to everyone in the room. Then they use a lid to cover your mouth so you can't talk to anyone anymore. But, then your mustache starts talking, saying the same thing. That's why this lid covers both your mustache and your mouth. Now you can't say that you are tall or expensive.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic:
"I am taller and more expensive than you."
You're saying this because there are some ã“ã†ã„ã¡s in the room, and you want to make them feel inferior (you're a ã“ã†ã„ã¡ hater). You keep comparing your height to the ã“ã†ã„ã¡s in the room, and you keep checking price tags. Then you tell them you're taller and more expensive than they are.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: The ã“ã†ã„ã¡s finally get tired of your shenanigans, and lid up your mouth and mustache so you can't say that you're tall or expensive.

The original meaning is a tall building. The extension is noble, noble, and noble. "Shuowen": "High, high. Like the form of viewing high from the platform. From å†‚, å›—, agree with Cang and She. Probably because high places are easy to overlook, " high " has a far-reaching meaning. The word "å£" was added afterwards to distinguish it from the word "äº¬". It is said that "å£" is like the window on the lower floor of the elephant house (Kong Guangju). See " Jing ".

Jia Jinwen is used as a place name. It also means far away, "Tunnan" 1102: "Gao Qi (ancestor)", Shiqiangpan: "Qing (Quiet) You Gao Qi (ancestor)", "Gao Zu" is a distant ancestor. Qin Gonggui: "Introduction and (have) celebration." " Yin " has the long-term meaning, which means good luck and good fortune in the long run. Bronze inscriptions use " Gao " as the name of a person and place, and it is suspected of taking its noble meaning. For example, the King Og Qizhou Festival: "Gaoqiu", the place is unknown. Basic explanation of words
high
gÄo
The distance from bottom to top is large, as opposed to "low": peak. high altitude. High. plateau. Towering. High mountains and flowing water (Yu confidant, confidant or brilliant music). High house construction (describe a condescending situation). Be far-sighted.
Height: He is 1.8 meters tall.
The highest level: advanced. College entrance examination.
Above the general standard or average level: high quality. High consumption. High price. Upscale. Master. High energy physics.
The voice is loud: singing loudly.
Respectful speech, saying things of others: good ideas. High. High argument. longevity. Gaotang. High disciple.
Warm, grand: high. Elated.
Noble, high moral level: noble. Upright. Gao Fengliang. noble. elegant. Gao Jie.
The most supreme name in the clan: Gaozu.
The acid radical or compound contains one more oxygen atom than the standard acid radical: potassium permanganate.

["Guangyun" Gu Laoqie, Pinghao, see you. ]
Also known as "é«™1".
(1) The distance from the bottom to the top is large, in contrast to "short"; far from the ground, in contrast to "low".
(2) Height.
(3) High places. Refers to mountains and hills.
(4) Elevation; Elevation; Elevation.
(5) The ratio is high;
(6) Deep, high and deep.
(7) The sound is loud or sharp.
(8) Big, grand.
(9) Pride; arrogant.
(10) Smart; high strength; superb.
(11) Extended to be good at.
(12) Excellent.
(13) Noble; noble.
(14) Refers to noble character.
(15) Refers to a noble person; a hermit.
(16) Far away.
(17) More than.
(18) The highest name in the clan. Also known as a distant ancestor.
(19) Refers to Han Gaozu.
(20) Old and old.
(21) Noble; Noble show.
(22) Noble place, noble place.
(23) Respect; respect.
(24) Honorific words. See "Gao Surname".
(25) Founder is majestic.
(26) Transcendence.
(27) Above the general standard or average level.
(28) Refers to the upper level.
(29) Pass "paste". See "Sorghum".

Meaning Mnemonic
There's a lid on your mouth and mustache, covering up all your talking holes. This is because you kept saying how tall and expensive you are.
Imagine yourself saying how tall and expensive you are to everyone in the room. Then they use a lid to cover your mouth so you can't talk to anyone anymore. But, then your mustache starts talking, saying the same thing. That's why this lid covers both your mustache and your mouth. Now you can't say that you are tall or expensive.
